qas.question: What other action star was an international hit in the 1980s?
What year was Schwarzenegger's film The Running Man released?

context: During the 1980s, audiences had an appetite for action films, with both Schwarzenegger and <a0_0>Sylvester Stallone<a0_0/> becoming international stars. Schwarzenegger's roles reflected his sense of humor, separating him from more serious action hero films, such as the alternative universe poster for Terminator 2: Judgment Day starring Stallone in the comedy thriller Last Action Hero. He made a number of successful films, such as Commando (1985), Raw Deal (1986), The Running Man (<a1_0>1987<a1_0/>), Predator (1987), and Red Heat (1988).
